changeSet.author: mdubrovin
changeSet.comment: Add the priority field to mark the POC case files(caseFile table)
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE prodlims.casefile ADD COLUMN pocPriorityHigh bit(1) DEFAULT NULL;
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE prodlims.casefile DROP COLUMN pocPriorityHigh;

changeSet.author: mdubrovin
changeSet.comment: Add the priority field to mark the POC case files(sample table)
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE prodlims.sample ADD COLUMN pocPriorityHigh bit(1) DEFAULT NULL;
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE prodlims.sample DROP COLUMN pocPriorityHigh;
